Name: God Sword
About the game: God Sword is an online world designed to present the real world In this world where each group of servers can accommodate 4,000 people: *Each character is the beginning of a new life, you must work hard to grow, Learn all kinds of skills to have a chance of survival. There are 138 kinds of skills in the game, including swords, hidden weapons, ninjutsu, forging, business, etc. You can become the royal city lord or a generation of swordsman in this world, But the meeting of life and death is between talk and laugh... *You can interact with other players freely, including kisses and hugs, etc. There is no restriction on hypocrisy in this arena. Remember, your character will die at any time, and will age. *This is a real world, there are no hypocritical restrictions and norms, only the sword and sword in hand represent everything. Please be psychologically prepared, you may face unbearable blows and pains in the game, including all the lost efforts... *The game has no in-app purchase mechanism, all currency and equipment are obtained in the game. And they can be freely traded. If you want to establish any rules here, please do so with your axe and sword!! Here is called God Sword... [In this world where each server can accommodate 4000 players] * Players will be able to steal, rob, sex, and kill each other. *It can even take the opponent's life and kill the opponent. Make the opponent permanently unable to log in again. * Players will be able to smash each other naked when attacking NPC monsters. *Support MOD module, including general manual installation and Steam creation workshop. *All calculations related to character battles are performed on the server, giving you the fairest PK battle. *There is no stored value or small consumption mechanism. All currencies and equipment in the game can be freely traded. *Login does not need to provide the player's information, the server does not record the client's login IP location time and other information. *No ID and e-mail required to apply for an account *The server does not record the login IP and time Everything here will only stay here...and in your memories. Characters can freely interact with each other in sex and killing, and there is no hypocritical ethics. Character was born, aged, and died here. Equipment and currency can be freely traded, Shangniang coins (mall coins) are mined and sold by the players themselves, No stored value system 'An original universe that truly belongs to the player and is centered on the player - God Sword'
